name: Tsuushin Taikyoku: Hayazashi Shogi Sandan
overview: In "Talking Ghost Story Shogi 3-stage", you can enjoy playing enough computer games as well as players who have memories on your arms. With the simple operation of only the Wii remote control, you can challenge a serious opponent against a computer that unleashes a sharp one instantly. TACOS (tacos) of the Japan Advanced Institute of Science University is adopted as AI (artificial intelligence) of CPU.
